de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.api.profile.keys

Interface DocumentKeyStoreOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentKeyStoreOperationsImpl, DocumentKeyStoreOperationsImplRuntimeDelegatable

    public interface DocumentKeyStoreOperations
    This class is responsible for accessing/updating/creating users' keystore that contains keys for DOCUMENT access on higher level.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<PublicKeyIDWithPublicKey> createAndWriteKeyStore(UserIDAuth forUser)
      Creates keystore and returns public keys from it.
      Key getKey(UserIDAuth forUser, String alias)
      Read key from the keystore associated with user.
      Set<String> readAliases(UserIDAuth forUser)
      Aliases of keys stored in keystore associated with user.
      void updateReadKeyPassword(UserIDAuth forUser, ReadKeyPassword newPassword)
      Updates ReadKeyPassword for users' keystore.

    • Method Detail

      • createAndWriteKeyStore

        List<PublicKeyIDWithPublicKey> createAndWriteKeyStore(UserIDAuth forUser)
        Creates keystore and returns public keys from it.
        Parameters:
        forUser - Keystore owner
        Returns:
        Created public keys from keystore.

      • updateReadKeyPassword

        void updateReadKeyPassword(UserIDAuth forUser,
                           ReadKeyPassword newPassword)
        Updates ReadKeyPassword for users' keystore. Clears ALL cached keystores.
        Parameters:
        forUser - Keystore owner.
        newPassword - New ReadKeyStore password.

      • getKey

        Key getKey(UserIDAuth forUser,
           String alias)
        Read key from the keystore associated with user.
        Parameters:
        forUser - keystore owner
        alias - key alias to read
        Returns:
        Key from keystore.

      • readAliases

        Set<String> readAliases(UserIDAuth forUser)
        Aliases of keys stored in keystore associated with user.
        Parameters:
        forUser - keystore owner.
        Returns:
        Key aliases from keystore.
